title: What to Know as the Trump Organization’s Tax Fraud Trial Resumes
description: After pausing because of a Covid outbreak, the prosecution of the former president’s company was to start again Thursday. Reacquaint yourself with events so far and what’s to come.
dc:creator: Lola Fadulu
media:description: The defense lawyer Michael van der Veen, left, arriving at court for the start of the Trump Organization’s criminal trial on Oct. 24.
